Package com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary.transformers

Contains tranformer contract and other generic transformers which are used to tranform raw numbers and words into words used by dictionary and number converters.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    InputTransformer<T>
    Interface to define a contract for the different transformation implementations.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    StripAndValidateInput
    A transformer class which would strip the unwanted characters from the input, and validate if it contains desired characters only.
    Ex- If the rule says to strip whitespaces and punctuations from the numbers and dictionary words, then corresponding StripAndValidateInput.stripCharsPattern is provided to do the same.
    Once the unwanted characters are removed, StripAndValidateInput.validCharsPattern is used to verify if only desired characters remain
    TransformerContainer<T>
    It is a generic container class of the below different transformations that happen now in converting numbers to a word combination.
    UpperCaseTransformer
    Decorator class which transforms an input string to upper case If there is a parentTransformer provided then first it would use that to do the first level of transformation.

Package com.aconex.challenge.numbertowords.dictionary.transformers Description

Contains tranformer contract and other generic transformers which are used to tranform raw numbers and words into words used by dictionary and number converters. The transformers are based on the business rules.
